item.title: Resume
item.description: Experience PwC | Software Engineer (Global Team) US Apr 2023 - May 2024 · 1 yr 2 mos As part of the Global PwC Identity team, I work on Access Management solutions for our internal global services, mainly focusing on Forgerock products and Azure Devops pipelines PwC | IAM Developer - Specialist 5 Argentina Apr 2023 - May 2024 · 1 yr 2 mos Identity and Access Management developer for PwC internal services.
